mapper.sql: id, mobile, password, firm_id, username, id_number, affiliation_firm, position, areaname, role_id
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password FROM user_t WHERE username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_t ( id, username,password ) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{password, jdbcType=VARCHAR});

insert into user (id, mobile, password, firm_id, username, id_number, affiliation_firm, position, areaname, role_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobile,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{affiliationFirm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{areaname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
